sentences.en: 6 is an integer, but 6.4 is not.
A given integer sequence, request an increase of its maximum length sequence.
sentences.cn: 给定的整数序列, 请求出其最长上升子序列的长度.

sentences.en: As accessors can be overloaded, the string and integer versions can co - exist.
sentences.cn: 由于访问器可被重载, 字符串和整数版本可以共存.

sentences.en: C # does not limit the index type to integer.
sentences.cn: C # 并不将索引类型限制为整数.

sentences.en: Converts a specified integer value to an enumeration member.
sentences.cn: 将指定的整数值转换为枚举成员.

sentences.en: Converts the specified 64 - bIt'signed integer to an enumeration member.
sentences.cn: 将具有整数值的指定对象转换为枚举成员.

sentences.en: Convex analysis, Lagrangian relaxation, non differentiable optimization, and applications in integer programming.
sentences.cn: 凸分析 、 拉格朗日松弛法 、 不可微分函数最适化以及在整数规划上的应用.

sentences.en: Mathematical models that use linear, nonlinear, dynamic, integer, or multi - objective programming algorithms.
sentences.cn: 数学模型,如利用线性 、 非线性 、 动态 、 整数或 多目标 编程算法.

sentences.en: Ordinal types include integer, character, Boolean, enumerated, and subrange types.
sentences.cn: 序数类型包括整数 、 字符 、 布尔 、 枚举 、 子界等类型.

sentences.en: Precedence is either an integer or the special token force.
sentences.cn: 整数和特定符号的优先级最高.

sentences.en: Surely the output should be true and then false, since both Integer objects are the same.
sentences.cn: 一般人都会认为输出结果肯定先是true,再是false, 因为两个Integer对象 都是相同的.

sentences.en: The integer data type is toa numeric value without a fractional component.
sentences.cn: 所有数值数据类型都是从小数数据类型里派生出来的.

sentences.en: The natural unit of integer computation on a given machine.
sentences.cn: 机器上的自然的整型计算单元.

sentences.en: The thesis uses 0 - 1 integer linear programming to construct algorithm - hardware mapping models.
sentences.cn: 论文运用运筹学中的 0-1 整数规划方法建立算法 - 硬件映射模型.

sentences.en: This example sets the environment to display integer values in hexadecimal format.
sentences.cn: 设置或返回用于显示整型值的数字基数.

sentences.en: This is the process identifier ( PID ), which is a 32 - bit integer value.
sentences.cn: 这是进程标识符, 它是32位的整数值.

words.tran_cn: 综合的；完整的；互相协调的
整合；使…成整体（integrate的过去分词）
求积分；取消隔离；成为一体
使…完整；使…成整体；求…的积分；表示…的总和
